carlstm

Class TxInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • carlstm.TxInfo

  •  class TxInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds transactional state for a single thread. You should use ThreadLocal to allocate a TxInfo to each Java thread. This class is only used within the STM implementation, so it and its members are set to package (default) visibility.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TxInfo() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) void abort()
      This method cleans up any transactional state if a transaction aborts.
      (package private) boolean commit()
      Try to commit a completed transaction.
      (package private) void start()
      Start a transaction by initializing any necessary state.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TxInfo

        TxInfo()

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        Start a transaction by initializing any necessary state. This method should throw TransactionAlreadyActiveException if a transaction is already being executed.

      • commit

        boolean commit()
        Try to commit a completed transaction. This method should update any written TxObjects, acquiring locks on those objects as needed.
        Returns:
        true if the commit succeeds, false if the transaction aborted

      • abort

        void abort()
        This method cleans up any transactional state if a transaction aborts.
